sentences.en: An inkling of untoward deeds on the part of Hurstwood had come.
sentences.cn: 现在终于让她得知了一点赫斯渥行为不轨的消息.

sentences.en: Any untoward medicaloccurrence in a patient or clinical investigation subject administered apharmaceutical product and which does not necessarily have a causalrelationship with this treatment.
sentences.cn: 在用药病人或临床研究对象中发生的任何不幸医疗事件，他不一定要与治疗有因果关系。

sentences.en: At midmonth, you may experience an untoward surprise involving money.
sentences.cn: 月中旬, 你可能会经历金钱方面的意外.

sentences.en: Conclusion Cardura could reduce medicine untoward reaction obviously.
sentences.cn: 结论可多华可明显减少药物的不良反应.

sentences.en: Indeed, anything untoward was now kept from James.
sentences.cn: 的确, 现在一切不顺心的事都小心瞒着詹姆士.

sentences.en: It is untoward for us to acquaint with nowadays how difficult it was for the pioneer.
sentences.cn: 我们的目标是改掉被用的很多的动词与形容词,副词,这样句子就会有耳目一新的感觉.

sentences.en: Monitor child's therapeutic and untoward response to medications; monitor the action and side effects of administered medications.
sentences.cn: 监视患儿对药物的治疗反应和不利反应，观察药物的作用及副作用。

sentences.en: Nurse observation play an important role in detection of untoward reactions.
sentences.cn: 应充分发挥护士观察力在药物不良反应发现中的价值.

sentences.en: Objective Analyze the untoward effect caused by intravenous transfusion.
sentences.cn: 目的分析静脉输液引起的不良反应及相应对策.

sentences.en: Short of some tremendous accident or untoward event it could not be anything else.
sentences.cn: 除了一件大事,或别的不幸的事外,这不可能是别的事情.

sentences.en: Tampering with a single enzyme can lead to untoward effects elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 破坏一种酶可能会导致在别处出现异常。

sentences.en: The immediate cause of everyone's distress is an untoward sequence of weather events.
sentences.cn: 给所有人都带来痛苦的直接原因是一系列恼人的气候现象.

sentences.en: The surveyor's report didn't highlight anything untoward.
sentences.cn: 测量员的报告没有强调有出乎意料的困难。

sentences.en: The untoward effect of these antioxidants was noted whether they were taken separately or together.
sentences.cn: 无论单独还是联合应用这些抗氧化剂均有显著副作用.

sentences.en: These nouns consternation that something untoward may be impending.
sentences.cn: 这些名词意指对某些迫近的不吉之事的焦虑.

sentences.en: This alarmed me in case anything untoward formed the foundations of his memory.
sentences.cn: 这让我担心,是不是有什么麻烦事让他形成了这种记忆.

sentences.en: Untoward circumstances prevent me from being with you on this festive occasion.
sentences.cn: 有些不幸的事件使我不能在这欢庆的时刻和你在一起.

sentences.en: You are much more protected & at peace of mind against any untoward incident.
sentences.cn: 对于任何不幸的事件,你都能得到最大限度的保护.

words.tran_cn: 不幸的；麻烦的；倔强的；困难的

trans.tran_cn: 意外的， 不顺利的，倔强的，难对付的
